<js>
var page="";
var n=baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+)\/(\d+)\/$/);
var index=parseInt(n[2])+1;
var size=n[1];

  page=baseUrl.replace(/\/(\d+)\/$/,"/"+index+"/");
page
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var base="https://chapter.61spring.com/chapter/b"+java.get("bid")+"/c";

var list=[];
JSON.parse(result).chapterlist.forEach(ch=>{
if(ch.islink) list.push({
k:ch.chaptername,
v:base+ch.chapterid+".html"
});
});
list
</js>
ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
(function(param){
var bid=java.get("bid");
var json=JSON.parse(param);

var p=json.chapterlist.pop();
var pn=p.number;
var pid=p.chapterid;
var pname=p.chaptername;

if(json.end == 0){
  return "/chapter/dir"+bid+"/"+pid+"/"+pn+"/?chaptername="+encodeURIComponent(pname)+"&";
}

return null;
})(result)
</js>

    return JSON.parse(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.stringify(decryptedData));
}

function decrypt(data){
    var key = CryptoJS.enc.Base64.parse("bmpsZW1lbmcyMDE4MjAxNw==");
    var iv = CryptoJS.enc.Base64.parse('MTIzNDU2NzgxMjM0NTY3OA==');

    var decryptedData = CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(data, key, {
        iv: iv,
        mode: CryptoJS.mode.CBC,
        padding: CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7
    });
    return JSON.parse(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.stringify(decryptedData));
}

;var data=JSON.parse(result).data;
var base="https://api.lemengfun.com/h5/book/chapter/content?uid=0&bid="+java.get("bid")+"&cid=";
decrypt(data).data.chapterList.map(ch=>({
    name:ch.title, 
    url:base+ch.chapterId
}))</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
let doc=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(src);

function decode(str){
var s=String(str).replace(/\\/g,"`")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__\$/g,"9")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$___/g,"8")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$\$/g,"7")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$_/g,"6")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$_\$/g,"5")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__/g,"4")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$\$/g,"3")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$_/g,"2")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.__\$/g,"1")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.___/g,"0")
.replace(/\+|"/g,"")
.replace(/[\W\w]*[_\]]\(\'/,"")
.replace(/\'\)[\s\S]*/,"")
.replace(/````[A-Z]\._/g,"\\\\u")
.replace(/``/g,"\\")
.replace(/5_/g,"a")
.replace(/5\$/g,"b")
.replace(/6_/g,"c")
.replace(/6\$/g,"d")
.replace(/7_/g,"e")
.replace(/7\$/g,"f")
.replace(/\(\!\[\]\)\[2\]/g,"l")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$/g,"o")
.replace(/[A-Z].__/g,"t")
.replace(/[A-Z]._/g,"u");
s=eval('"'+s+'"');
return eval('"'+s+'"');
}

let place=doc.selectFirst('#content [id]');

if(place){
let js=doc.selectFirst('script:containsData(getDecode)').data();
place.html('â˜…'+decode(js)+'â˜†');
}

doc.select('p:containsOwn(ä¹¦å‹å¤§æœ¬è¥)').remove();

doc.getElementById('content').outerHtml()
</js>

<js>try {

if (f) {eval(f[0]); getDecode();}

doc.outerHtml();
}catch(e){e;}

(function(){
  var b64=String(src).match(/ttf;base64,([^\)]+)/);
  if(b64){
    var f1 = java.queryBase64TTF(b64[1]);
    var f2 = java.queryTTF("https://alanskycn.gitee.io/teachme/assets/font/Source Han Sans CN Regular.ttf");
    return java.replaceFont(result, f1, f2);
  }
  return result;
})()
</js>

var doc=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result).getElementById('booktext');
var picList=doc.select("img").toArray();
var ocrUrl="https://service-osa7h4kn-1256208280.ap-shanghai.apigateway.myqcloud.com/release/ocr/huweibaiduocR111?handle_png=true&image_url="
var content=doc.html();

if(picList.length>0){
  let ocrList=picList.map(p=>{
    let url=p.attr("src");
    if(!url.startsWith('http')){
       url="http://www.yipinxia.net"+url;
    }
    var ocrRes=java.ajax(ocrUrl+url);
    return JSON.parse(ocrRes).result[url];
  });
  content=ocrList.join("\n");
}

String(content).replace(/.*ä¸€.{0,3}å“.{0,3}ä¾ .*/g,"")
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
(function(){
  var content=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(src).select(".jsChapterWrapper p").toArray().map(e=>e.ownText()).join("\n");
  var b64=String(src).match(/ttf;base64,([^\)]+)/);
  if(b64){
    var f1 = java.queryBase64TTF(b64[1]);
    var f2 = java.queryTTF("https://alanskycn.gitee.io/teachme/assets/font/Source Han Sans CN Regular.ttf");
    return java.replaceFont(content, f1, f2);
  }
  return content;
})()
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var list=[];
JSON.parse(result).Volumes.forEach(v=>{
let ch_list=v.Chapters.map(ch=>({
'title':ch.Chapter_name,
'link':'http://qinxiaoshuo.com/api/book/chapter/get/'+v.Book_id+'/'+ch.Chapter_id,
'info':v.Volume_name
}));
Array.prototype.push.apply(list,ch_list);
})

list
</js>

header:
<js>
var time = parseInt(new Date().getTime()/1000);
var sign=java.md5Encode("Android"+time+"2E8PObAj8HI45Qu9").toUpperCase();

var headers={
  "User-Agent": "okhttp/3.8.1",
  "Content-Type": "application/json",
  "UID": 1193,
  "AUTHKEY": "Android",
  "TIMESTAMP": time,
  "SIGN": String(sign)
};
JSON.stringify(headers)
</js>
